item.description:
[color=red]The Other Boleyn Girl[/color]
[b]Synopsis: Adapted from author Philippa Gregory's historical novel of the same name, director Justin Chadwick's atmospheric period drama follows the fierce competition between sisters Mary and Anne Boleyn to win the affections of Tudor King Henry VIII. ~ Jason Buchanan, All Movie Guide[/b]
Trailer: <xobject width="425" height="355"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/q7yBkPtg26I&rel=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="355" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.how_to_find_us: The film will be in auditorium 14 upstairs. This is the 735 showing. I'll be by the consession stand sitting. Please arrive by 715.
item.name: The Other Boleyn Girl
